name: Figma Tutorials - Smart Animate Prototyping
description:
Since Rogie, Joey and Noah have worked on some smart animate prototypes presented in Figma Livestream, Office Hours session, I have decided to redesign them to real use cases.


And also added some new use cases.


All designs that you can see are included in Brainstorming UI kit for free.


Menu interactions (a file that I made before) can be integrated into those use cases too.

https://www.figma.com/community/file/838085275736757482/Micro-interactions---Menu-samples


Original file by Rogie

https://www.figma.com/community/file/847571360501731817/Hacking-Prototypes


Original file by Noah

https://www.figma.com/community/file/812143143597260055/9-Smart-Animate-Examples
